attributes.action: A Petition on Behalf of the People of The United Kingdom in Issuance of a No Confidence for the Candidacy of Gov. Mitt Romney.
attributes.additional_details:
A Petition on Behalf of the People of The United Kingdom in Issuance of a Vote of No Confidence for the United States Presidential Candidacy of Governor Mitt Romney.

On behalf of those hereto signed, representing the People of the United Kingdom, aware of our inability to participate directly in the democratic processes of The United States Federal Government, it is the intent of this petition to issue a vote of no confidence towards the candidacy of Governor Willard Mitt Romney in his bid for the office of The United States Presidency.

The consequences of Governor Romney assuming this office is felt by those signed to not be in the best interest of The United States, the citizens of The United Kingdom and the New Commonwealth, and most those nations with direct dealings with The United States of America.
